CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

receiptUrl.description: The receipt URL if receipt generated by CSMS. The Charging Station can QR encode it and show it to the EV Driver.

receiptId.description: The receipt id if the receipt is generated by CSMS.
